Name: Rescue Dash - Time Management Simulator
About the game: It's total chaos in the city: all the animals in the local zoo have escaped! Seals, dogs, rabbits, raccoonsâ€”they all need rescuing and returning home! The rescue team, led by the brave Jessica, zooms off to help everyone and restore peace and order in the city. Exciting challenges are waiting! Look, those children are stuck on a Ferris wheel! Don't let them fall and end up in hospital! Save them and make their parents happy! Make new friends, build your own team, and go on adventures. Enjoy the variety of locations and emergencies! Rescuers are always in demand! Get to work in a hotel, supermarket, restaurant, movie studio, on a cruise liner, and a farm. You'll be driving a fire truck, removing trash, rebuilding roads, renovating buildings, and saving animals and feeding them tasty treats. Try your hand as a firefighter, beach lifeguard, and emergency worker! To complete your mission, you'll have to move fast, think smart, and be a team player! Over the course of your quest, you'll need to collect and use resources. Develop your own strategy and complete tasks as efficiently as possible. Use your brain to win! And don't forget about the time limit! Try to solve the puzzles in time!
